document.full_text: randall cobb reminds me of hines ward. i love how cobb attacks defenders as a run blocker, and i haven't seen this kind of aggressive mind-set since santonio holmes's days at ohio state five years ago.
document.title: n.f.l. draft: randall cobb, third-ranked receiver
lines_and_colors: randall cobb reminds me of hines ward. i love how cobb attacks defenders as a run blocker, and i haven't seen this kind of aggressive mind-set since santonio holmes's days at ohio state five years ago.
